#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char pat[4000005];
int lps[4000005];
int main()
{
    int len,i,m;
    scanf("%s",pat);
    while(!(pat[0]=='E' && pat[1]=='n' && pat[2]=='d' && pat[3]=='\0'))
    {
        len = 0;
    m=strlen(pat);
    lps[0] = 0; // lps[0] is always 0
    i = 1;

    // the loop calculates lps[i] for i = 1 to M-1
    while (i < m)
    {
       if (pat[i] == pat[len])
       {
         len++;
         lps[i] = len;
         i++;
       }
       else // (pat[i] != pat[len])
       {
         if (len != 0)
         {
           // This is tricky. Consider the example AAACAAAA and i = 7.
           len = lps[len-1];

           // Also, note that we do not increment i here
         }
         else // if (len == 0)
         {
           lps[i] = 0;
           i++;
         }
       }
    }
    for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        printf("%d ",lps[i]);
    printf("\n");
        scanf("%s",pat);
    }
    return 0;
}
